questions.question: Salt dissolves in a cup of water sitting on a table. In this scenario which is the system?

choices.answer: The cup of salt and water

questions.question: Hydrogen and oxygen mix in a tank on a lab bench. In the scenario, which is the surroundings?

choices.answer: The tank full of oxygen and hydrogen gas

questions.question: Food Digests in your stomach.  In this scenario what is the system?
Chlorine and hydrogen are mixed to make HCl in a flask on a lab bench. Which is the system?

choices.answer: The flask with hydrogen and chlorine

questions.question: Hot air is heated in a hot air balloon. In this scenario, what is considered the surroundings?
